newsitem.title: HONG KONG: Mancon Bhd unit $100 mln FRN group forms.
newsitem.headline: Mancon Bhd unit $100 mln FRN group forms.

text.p: A syndicate group has formed for Mancon (BVI) Investment Holding Co Ltd's US$100 million floating-rate notes issue due 2002, the lead managers said.

The notes, guaranteed by Mancon Berhad, were issued at par to float at 150 basis points over the London Interbank Offered Rate (LIBOR). They were re-offered at 99.625 to give a re-offer spread of LIBOR plus 162.5 basis points.
There is a put option after the third and fourth anniversary. With fees, the all-in return for top-tier managers is 175 basis points.
Deutsche Morgan Grenfell and DCB Bank are joint lead managers. Nikko Securities is co-lead manager.
Hua Nan Commercial Bank, Merrill Lynch Far East and Oversea-Chinese Banking Corp are co-managers.
